name: project-template
description: This is my personal full stack project template, consisting of a [React](https://reactjs.org/) frontend application run using [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/), and a [NodeJS](https://nodejs.org/) backend which uses [Express](https://expressjs.com/), both written in [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/).
author: TheOmer77
